creditline: Gift of Peter Pflaum and Stephen R. Pflaum
description: recto:  standing horse in profile from P, with a saddle and trappings; tail raised; another smaller, sketchier horse at right below center; verso:  putti in clouds at top; angels and other figures clustered together at center--ink at right, pencil at left; horse with sketchy rider at bottom center; man's face in LRQ
title: Study of two horses (recto); Miraculous Draught of Fishes, Horse and Rider, and other Studies (verso)
